steps.name: User should be on SignIn Page
User mouse hover on sign in menu
Click on the Sign in button
Page title should be "Amazon Sign In"

steps.name: User should be on SignIn Page
User click on sign in button
User should be redirected to SignInRedirect page
Page title of SignInRedirect  page should be "Amazon Sign In"
